titles: An expostulation or complaynte agaynste the blasphemyes of a franticke papyst of Hamshyre. Co[m]piled by Iohan Bale
author: Bale, John, 1495-1563.
publisher: [by S. Mierdman for] Ihon Daye, dwellyng ouer Aldersgate beneth Saynte Martyns, and are to be soulde at the shope by the litle Condite in Chepesyde,
notes: Imprint from colophon; actual printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
